schema.description: Define configurations using a unique string identifier.

success.description: Return the status of the API call success.

schema.description: Define configurations using a unique string identifier.

success.description: Return the status of the API call success.

count.description: Defines the total number of results for the requested service.

page.description: Defines the current page within paginated list of results.

per_page.description: Defines the number of results per page of results.

total_count.description: Defines the total results available without any search parameters.

disabled.description: Set to true to disable caching of SQL responses. Default is false.
Set to true to disable caching of SQL responses. Default is false.

max_age.description: Specify the maximum duration items should persist in the cache. Not returned if set to the default (60).

stale_while_revalidate.description: Specify the number of seconds the cache may serve a stale response. Omitted if set to the default (15).

created_on.description: Defines the creation time of the Hyperdrive configuration.

id.description: Define configurations using a unique string identifier.

modified_on.description: Defines the last modified time of the Hyperdrive configuration.

ca_certificate_id.description: Define CA certificate ID obtained after uploading CA cert.

mtls_certificate_id.description: Define mTLS certificate ID obtained after uploading client cert.

sslmode.description: Set SSL mode to 'require', 'verify-ca', or 'verify-full' to verify the CA.

database.description: Set the name of your origin database.

password.description: Set the password needed to access your origin database. The API never returns this write-only value.

scheme.description: Specifies the URL scheme used to connect to your origin database.

user.description: Set the user of your origin database.

host.description: Defines the host (hostname or IP) of your origin database.

port.description: Defines the port (default: 5432 for Postgres) of your origin database.

database.description: Set the name of your origin database.

password.description: Set the password needed to access your origin database. The API never returns this write-only value.

scheme.description: Specifies the URL scheme used to connect to your origin database.

user.description: Set the user of your origin database.

access_client_id.description: Defines the Client ID of the Access token to use when connecting to the origin database.

access_client_secret.description: Defines the Client Secret of the Access Token to use when connecting to the origin database. The API never returns this write-only value.

host.description: Defines the host (hostname or IP) of your origin database.

origin_connection_limit.description: The (soft) maximum number of connections the Hyperdrive is allowed to make to the origin database.

success.description: Return the status of the API call success.
